turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hey, I need some help. I'm looking for some new shoes, and I'm totally overwhelmed. I don't even know where to start.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: No problem! I can definitely help with that. To give you the best recommendations, what kind of style are you looking for? Casual, athletic, formal, something else?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, well, I'd like something casual, but also a bit stylish. I want something I can wear around town, maybe out to a bar or a casual date. No clunky athletic shoes or anything super formal.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Alright! Based on that, I'd recommend looking into these styles: Chelsea boots, loafers, or minimalist sneakers. They are versatile and can fit into your lifestyle. Should I provide some specific brand recommendations?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm, Chelsea boots and loafers... those seem a bit dressy. I'm leaning more towards minimalist sneakers. But, I have wide feet. Do you know brands that offer stylish minimalist sneakers in wide sizes? That's always a problem for me.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: That's a great question! Unfortunately, my knowledge base doesn't contain real-time, up-to-the-minute stock information on shoe sizes. However, I can suggest some brands known for minimalist sneakers and wide sizes: New Balance, Lems, and Altra. I highly recommend checking their websites to confirm size availability before purchasing. Good luck!
